actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1960 relating to the conveyance of land by the Secretary of the Army for development of public port or industrial facilities.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Act of 1960 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to consider commercial activities which will further the development of the public port or industrial facilities, which are under his jurisdiction as part of a water resources project, when determining whether conveyance of surplus real property to a State or political subdivision thereof is in the public interest.

titles.title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1960 relating to the conveyance of land by the Secretary of the Army for development of public port or industrial facilities.
